name: iBrow.se
description: Your starting point for online shopping.
overview:
iBrow.se is your personalized starting point for online shopping.

Today, people’s online shopping preferences are scattered across silos (e.g. individual online stores) and general purpose tools (e.g. email, browser bookmarks, etc.).

Because of this, your shopping preferences get lost, like the link to that cool store you found that’s now lost in the middle of unorganized browser bookmarks, or they clutter up more important things, like the dozen deal emails that come into your inbox every day from stores and obscure messages from friends and family.

iBrow.se simplifies, centralizes, and personalizes your online shopping experience, by creating a personal starting point for online shopping that aggregates and organizes your shopping preferences (e.g. your favorite stores, deals, etc.), so that they’re easily accessible when you want to go shopping.

Lastly, in addition to aggregating your preferences and making the easily accessible, iBrow.se also helps you discover more stores and more deals that you might like, based on your preferences. So, not only is it easier to shop at your favorite stores, but it’s also easy to discover new favorite stores from the thousands of amazing online stores out there, where you can find great products for yourself or gifts for friends and family.
